name: Astral: Rebirth
description:
A game by Dogtopius and Facemeltingsolos

Information

If you are playing on a browser you may need to press a key to allow music to be played. If you don't want to do this use the windows downloadable. Unpack the .zip and run AstralRebirth.exe (or nw.exe on the 32bit version)

Controls

F/Esc - Toggle fullscreen

Left and right arrow keys/ left and right dpad - movement

Up arrow key/ (A) - Jump

Y/(Y) - Interact (Save rooms, dialogue)

Z/(X) - Attack

M/Xbox menu button - view map
